argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cnsubglem.1 | |- ( x e. A -> x e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | cnsubglem.2 | |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) -> ( x + y ) e. A ) |
| 3 |  | cnsubglem.3 | |- ( x e. A -> -u x e. A ) |
| 4 |  | cnsubrglem.4 | |- 1 e. A |
| 5 |  | cnsubrglem.5 | |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) -> ( x x. y ) e. A ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_cnsubglem | |- A e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) |
| 7 | 5 | #P_rgen2a | |- A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x x. y ) e. A |
| 8 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 9 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 10 |  | #P_cnfld1 | |- 1 = ( 1r ` CCfld ) |
| 11 |  | #P_cnfldmul | |- x. = ( .r ` CCfld ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_issubrg2 | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> ( A e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) <-> ( A e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ 1 e. A /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x x. y ) e. A ) ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) <-> ( A e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ 1 e. A /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x x. y ) e. A ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 4, 7, 13 | #P_mpbir3an | |- A e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
